content: Hassan Ashtiani Associate Professor Department of Computing and Software Faculty of Engineering McMaster University Faculty Member The Vector Institute Email: zokaeiam@mcmaster.ca Phone: +1-905-525-9140 ext. 27234 Office: ITB 246 [Publications] [Bio] [Students] Research Broadly speaking, my research interests are Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Statistics, and Theoretical Computer Science.
